SEARCH
Package controller

Class ControllerImpl

java.lang.Object
controller.ControllerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
public class ControllerImpl extends Object implements Controller
The controller implementation that receives all its inputs from an InputStream object and transmits all outputs to a PrintStream object. It also interacts with the model based on the received input from the user.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ControllerImpl(InputStream in, PrintStream out, ModelInterface model)
    Construct a controller implementation object that has the provided InputStream, PrintStream and ModelInterface object.

    Method

    void
    addShareWithApiInput()
    Receives share information from the user and passes it to the model interface object.
    void
    createPortfolio()
    Asks the user for input like if he wants to add shares, once a share is added the user get the option to create the portfolio.
    boolean
    showValuationOfPortfolio(String selectedId)
    Returns the valuation of the portfolio which the user has entered and returns false if the portfolio with the given id does not exist.
    void
    start()
    Behaves as the main menu for the program and gives the option to view, create and upload portfolio and navigate to appropriate state flow based on user interaction and model interface output.
    void
    uploadPortfolio()
    Sends the path from where the portfolio needs to be uploaded to the model interface object and notifies the user if something goes wrong during upload.
    void
    viewPortfolio()
    Interacts with the model interface object to get all portfolio information and then returns the same to the user as string output.

    • ControllerImpl

      public ControllerImpl(InputStream in, PrintStream out, ModelInterface model)
      Construct a controller implementation object that has the provided InputStream, PrintStream and ModelInterface object.
      Parameters:
      in - InputStream object to receive all the inputs
      out - PrintStream object to transmit all the outputs to
      model - ModelInterface object to communicate and receive data from model implementation

  • Method Details

    • createPortfolio

      public void createPortfolio()
      Description copied from interface: Controller
      Asks the user for input like if he wants to add shares, once a share is added the user get the option to create the portfolio. On receiving confirmation from the user the function interacts with the model interface object to transmit the portfolio information to be created.
      Specified by:
      createPortfolio in interface Controller

    • addShareWithApiInput

    • showValuationOfPortfolio

      public boolean showValuationOfPortfolio(String selectedId)
      Description copied from interface: Controller
      Returns the valuation of the portfolio which the user has entered and returns false if the portfolio with the given id does not exist.
      Specified by:
      showValuationOfPortfolio in interface Controller
      Parameters:
      selectedId - unique id of the portfolio for which the valuation is required on a particular date
      Returns:
      "true" if valuation exists else return "false"

    • viewPortfolio

      public void viewPortfolio()
      Description copied from interface: Controller
